nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -57,11 +58,15 @@ public void copiesFromBytesToPath() throws IOException {
         final File output = this.folder.newFile();
         new Assertion<>(
             "Must copy bytes to file path",
-            new TeeInput(
-                new BytesOf(message),
-                output.toPath()
+            new TextOf(
+                new TeeInput(
+                    new BytesOf(message),
+                    output.toPath()
+                )
             ),
-            new InputHasContent(message)
+            new TextIs(
+                new TextOf(output.toPath())
+            )

nodes.bodyText: @victornoel Please check that it is now correct. I have used examples that are in Input/Output

nodes.bodyText: @marceloamadeu this is better, please just use new InputHasContent to validate the content of the file instead of going through an extra layer via TextOf. We try to depends on the minimum of other classes in the tests to make them more robust.
